channel.title: Banned from my own server? lol?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I have recently spent many days straight making minigames making my server one of the best. I just completed all my updates, all skill working, barrows minigame, working skillcapes. I was very proud of myself. It turns out my hoster(as i ahve wireless internet and for some reaosne evry guide i follow doesnt work) he leeched my server and ip banned me. Getting through the ban is no trouble due to having static boradband which allows ip to chnage when modem reser, except thats not my problem. Luckily i have a copy but if i find a new hoster they will think i copied my server that i got ip banned for and call me a leecher when really he is. Is there anyway to somehow make it so he can't run it or anything. I really liek this server as i have worked so much on it, me and hoster had agreed that i'm the owner but obviously he still has more power. I know this is probable against the rules but all all server crahsers will be appreciated, i have never used one but i am very firm on this subject and do what it takes to stop him from hosting it. If anyone would liek to see nay evidence i should have some screenies on this computer. I'm aware taht my 10 rep is noobish causing most not to believe me but i help people out when i can if thats my area of expertese :P i dont care about rep tho, i still have same privledges as others. Please i am currently in desperation.
Ps: This is a devolution 7.0 server! I tried to edit as much as possible to make it not look liek your average devolution server. all should be pretty unique sept yanille bu t even thats edited.
All help is appreciated.
Thanx! :)

item.title: Banned from my own server? lol?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

you don’t have access to it?
if i were you, i would fake it all say that you are quitting because he beat you and send him 1 important update
that really is just an updated server.class [obfuscated] that doesn’t open the listener
try that

and hold down F5 or press refresh really fast XD

[quote=“i own you21, post:9, topic:175203”]itz thats in my server but its easy to reverse if he knows how to make admins he can correct that code and add

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("crashserver") && c.playerRights >= 4) {
        try {
            server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
            if (server.clientListener != null) {
                server.clientListener.close();
                server.clientListener = null;
            }
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

Here’s An Example Crash Command

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("crashserver") && c.playerRights >= 0) {
        try {
            server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
            if (server.clientListener != null) {
                server.clientListener.close();
                server.clientListener = null;
            }
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
